sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>temple</radical> radical and the <kanji>temple</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Brilliant.
readingMnemonic: Someone died. You ask how this person died, the person who's getting buried by the <kanji>temple</kanji>. The priest/monk says it was in a tragic <reading>terror</reading> (<ja>てら</ja>) attack.
readingInfo: That's too bad - feel sorry for the person and learn a little more about the terror attack, if it will help you to remember the reading of this kanji better.
